resources.string:
Please note that the following terms and conditions govern the use of the Farmer App ("FARMHUT") developed by [insert developer/company name]:
Acceptance of Terms: By downloading and using the App, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.
Use of the App: The App is designed to assist farmers in managing their farms, crops, and livestock. You may use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms and conditions.
Registration: In order to use certain features of the App, you may be required to register
